text: wfawwid amrk 'iilaa allah aleaziz aldhy la yghalab wala yuqhar, alrahim aldhy la ykhdhl awlya'h, wahu aladhi yarak hin taqum lilsalat whdk fi jwf allyl, wayaraa tqllubk mae alsaajidin fi salatihim maeak qaymana wrakeana wsajdana wjalsana, 'inh- sbhanh- hu alsamie ltlawtk wdhkrk, alealim bnytk wemlk
